member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER
member.summary: Receives the volume information from a call to FSCTL_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOLUME_INFO.

summary.para: The number of directories on the specified disk. This member is -1 if the number is unknown.
For UDF file systems with a virtual allocation table, this information is available only if the UDF revision is greater than 1.50.
The number of files on the specified disk. Returns -1 if the number is unknown.
For UDF file systems with a virtual allocation table, this information is available only if the UDF revision is greater than 1.50.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.FsFormatMajVersion
member.summary: The major version number of the file system. Returns -1 if the number is unknown or not applicable. On UDF 1.02 file systems, 1 is returned.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.FsFormatMinVersion
member.summary: The minor version number of the file system. Returns -1 if the number is unknown or not applicable. On UDF 1.02 file systems, 02 is returned.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.FormatTime
member.summary: The time the media was formatted.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.LastUpdateTime
member.summary: The time the media was last updated.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.CopyrightInfo
member.summary: Any copyright information associated with the volume.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.AbstractInfo
member.summary: Any abstract information written on the media.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.FormattingImplementationInfo
member.summary: Implementation-specific information; in some cases, it is the operating system version that the media was formatted by.

member.name: FILE_QUERY_ON_DISK_VOL_INFO_BUFFER.LastModifyingImplementationInfo
member.summary: The last implementation that modified the disk. This information is implementation specific; in some cases, it is the operating system version that the media was last modified by.
